right.text: "Just telling" so we're gonna play in semantics?

left.text: Alright hon. I don't blame you. I will say I don't see how I'm "doing everything in my power to hurt the pain out of you" by just telling you how I feel.

right.text: You really want to get into a semantic war with the girl who LITERALLY INVENTED MODERN FUCKING SEMANTIC DISASSEMBLY?
Then don't try that shit with me, I'll tear you apart. You have no idea what has gone on since I left Albany and I intend to keep it that way, because you can't handle it.
